text: "Some Old Side Road" is a song written by Roger D. Ferris and recorded by American country music artist Keith Whitley. It was released in November 1987 as the second single from the album Don't Close Your Eyes. The song reached number 16 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles & Tracks chart. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1987–1988) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |align="left"|Canadian RPM Country Tracks |align="center"|32 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1987 singles Category:1987 songs Category:Keith Whitley songs Category:RCA Records singles Category:Songs written by Roger Ferris
title: Some Old Side Road
